name: Triple Step
description:
Triple Step is a strategy/puzzle game. The games objective is you have to reach a chest on the opposite end of the map.

Sounds easy right...
Well not so fast...
In order to reach this chest you will have to deal with explosive squares and a timer.

Controls:

  • Use the directional arrows on the keyboard or
    use the mouse to move the character.
  • Left-Click or press Z twice to open up chest.
  • Hold Shift or Z to speed up character.
  • Press X for options menu.

Gameplay Features:

  • Four Difficulty Levels
  • One Tutorial Level
  • "Safe Zones"
  • Frustation Levels 1- 5
